title: Bug 19540XMLMemento.createReadRoot can return null
OB: Bug 19540XMLMemento.createReadRoot can return null F2 buildWe have several callers of XMLMemento.createReadRoot, none of which check fornull, which can be returned if it gets an IO exception or parsing exception.See the last stack in bug 19534 for an example (Workbench.java:755).Either createReadRoot should be changed to use checked exceptions and neverreturn null (preferable), or all callers must be changed to check for null.
